body:
* Improved alarm scheduling. Fixes #284 
* Optional version name check. Implemented by hemker. Fixes #304 #318

* Indonesian translation.
* Italian translation.
* Removed ads.

* Arabic translation.
* French translation.
* Bug fixes.

* Bug fixes for Search.
* Bug fixes for Fdroid and Play updaters.

* Allow exclusion of apps installed by an App Store (Play, Amazon).
* Turkish translation.

* Caching source icons.
* Bug fixes.
* First stable release.

* Bug fixes.
* Cache icons to prevent OOM.

name: 2.0.0-beta1
body:
Complete rewrite from scratch.

Features
* Update Sources: Find updates from APKMirror, Aptoide.
* Search Sources: Find new apps to install from APKMirror, Aptoide.
* Schedule background update checks and receive a notification when updates are found.
* Supports Android 4.0.3 to Android 10.
* Modern Material Design 2 with multiple theme support.
* Direct install of updates for sources that support it.
* App ignore list. Filter updates by architecture. Filter experimental apps. Filter apps by API level.

* Self update notification will also display changelog.
* Added Darth Droid Theme (AMOLED version of Dark Droid).
* Added help button to Google Account dialog. Help will take you to https://github.com/rumboalla/apkupdater/issues/223
* New translations: Chinese Simplified, Turkish, Dutch. Translators are now credited on project page.
* Bugfixes and small enhancements.

* Untranslated strings will display the default English string instead of being blank.
* Added polish translation.
* Added changelogs to updates. Click on the update to display or hide the changelog.
* Self update checks are done as part of the normal update process instead of only happening when the app is launched.

* Added support to use your own Google accounts. There is a new option in the Settings that will let you configure this.
* New translations: Danish, German, Russian. I'll be adding a credit section for translators, if you have translated something go to https://github.com/rumboalla/apkupdater/issues/211 and let me know. And remember if you want to help with translations you can do it here: https://poeditor.com/join/project/NWTNMrPFj8

* Automatic Install displays a notification with the current status and a report at the end. * Small changes to make Android TV navigation easier. Searching and button selection are now possible. * Using POEditor for translations. If you want to help with translations: [](https://poeditor.com/join/project/NWTNMrPFj8)

* App installation is much more compatible.
* **Beta**: Automatic background install of Play updates.
* Bug fixes and small enhancements

* Android O: App installs are now working. Android will ask you to enable the new install permission for the app.
* Android O: Notifications are displayed again.
* App is built with Android Studio 2. This will make the app work again on old versions of LineageOS/CyanogenMod that can't properly parse Android Studio 3 apks.
* Updated translations.
* More bugfixes.

* Self update check. App will check last release on GitHub and display a notification if an update is found. Clicking the notification will trigger the installation. There's an option in settings to disable this.
* Added new option to disable all animations and transitions.
* New translation: Arabic.
* Tweaked Bloody Void theme. Improved contrast and inverted floating button colors.
* Bug fixes and misc improvements.

* The install process is now much more robust. It will detect when the app is installed, if the download is cancelled, if the install is cancelled, etc.
* Added more Play accounts. This should alleviate 429 errors.

* Android TV Icon updated.
* Root commands now use libsuperuser.
* Root install is done in a background thread.
* Updated French and Italian strings.

* New icon. Thanks to [DIBBLED](http://www.dibbledesigns.blogspot.com/).
* Root install. Install apps using root so there's no need to interact with the Package Installer.

* Added Bloody Void theme.
* Updated french translation. (Primokorn)
* Italian translation. (Deltafox79).
* Slightly changed how the GooglePlay updater works. It will use less requests but the version string for the updates will be unknown. Should help with the 429 errors.
* Improved handling and display of errors.
* Bugfixes and small improvements.

* APKMirror updater now uses the official API. The updater is now much faster and supports architecture and api level filtering.
* Google Play updater added. The updater can find updates on Google Play and supports direct install of apps.
* Search for apps on Google Play.
* Many bug fixes and small enhancements.

* Android TV support.
* French translation (Bridouz).

* Beta updates display a beta icon.
* Updates are sorted alphabetically and stable fist.
* Spanish translation (DeicPro).

* Added option to select update time.
* Fixed UI and Animation issues with the Updates list.

* Installed and Updates cards now have actions.
* More bug fixes.

* Added nice progress bar to the update tab.
* Bug fixes.

* UI Improvements.
* Added transitions and animations.
* Updates are now sorted.

name: 1.4.0b2
body:
* UI and animation tweaks.
* Bug fixes: Log work again, 2.3 fixes, tablayout scroll behaviour, empty ignore list.
* Updates are now sorted.

name: 1.4.0b1
body: * Many UI changes and animations.

* Check for connection before updating.
* Reschedule update if no connection.
* Added option to select the number of threads used for updating.
* Moved some options to new section.
* Log displays last message first.
* Style fixes on settings dialogs.
* Added Wi-Fi only update option.

- Added option to exclude disabled apps (koroshiya).
- Fixed NullPointerException related to the NotificationManager.
- Improved version parsing.

- Fixed Uptodown updater.
- App list will refresh when Exclude System Apps option changes.
- Long click on an update will send you to Evozi.
- Added extra logging.
Added support for Uptodown.

- Fixed APKPure parser.
- Disabled Google Play parser since it's mostly useless.
- Updates now display both old and new version.
Added option for excluding system apps.

- New setting. Display notification only if at least one app. Thanks koroshiya.
- If webview in about fails, textview is used (koroshiya).
- Added user agent for apkmirror requests.
- APK is signed with the proper certificate again.

Added Turkish translation. Thanks to razor84.
Support for CM theming. Thanks to primokorn.
Apps are now sorted by name and ignore status.
Fixed issues with back button and actionbar titles.

- Updating versioncode.
  - Upgrading libraries.
  - Removed unused setting for ignore list.

- Fixed theming issue with log fragment.
- Log fragment saves state.
Added an error log to make troubleshooting of issues easier.
Replaced the PreferenceActivity for a PreferenceFragmentCompat.

- Fixed dark themes in Android 2.3
- Don't return an error if app is not found on Play.
Bugfixes for Android 2.3 devices.

- Fixed progress issue in notification if more than one source was selected.
- Fixed issue with default values of ignore list.

- Added toolbar to settings activity.
- Bug fixing.
Main feature is support for multiple themes.
